Runs the linker process, first links from commit messages, then issue thread items, then directly from the text anaylsis on issues.

linker - package linker
 
Linker - Class in linker
Abstract implementation of the Linker, Extending classes should override the Linker.Link() method to define their own methods of linking to Commit

Resultant model used in the several different linking methods

LinkerThreadWorker - Class in linker
A single worker for the Linker, it runs on a given set of Item and inserts the links (if any) into the SocialDb queue.
LinkerThreadWorker(Linker) - Constructor for class linker.LinkerThreadWorker
 
LinkFromCommitMessages() - Method in class jira.linker.JiraLinker
Links to the communications artifacts from the commit comments by searching for bug numbers using comm.ComResources.BUG_NUMBER_REGEX.
LinkFromCommitMessages() - Method in class linker.Linker
Links Commit to Issue by parsing commit messages and
finding the bug numbers.
LinkFromCommitMessagesBugzilla() - Method in class bugzilla.linker.BugzillaLinker
 
LinkFromIssueThreadItems() - Method in class linker.Linker
Links Item to Issue by parsing the date of the item
and the date of commits linked to the Item's thread.
LinkFromItems() - Method in class linker.Linker
Links Item to Commit by parsing through the data
in the Item's body and Summary to give Extraction objects that
can be linked to Commits.
linkItemsByMentionedFiles(Item, List<Person>, List<String>) - Method in class email.linker.EmailLinker

Runs the Jira linker on the two databases SocialDb, TechnicalDb
location - Variable in class jira.Jira
